transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road, taking people to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🎒 I'm often yellow.
🛑 I have a special stop sign that comes out.
🧒 I carry lots of children.

transport.question: I float on the water and carry people or cargo. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I'm bigger than a canoe.
⚓ I need an anchor to stay still.
🚢 Some are used for vacationing.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and carry many passengers. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I make a 'choo choo' sound.
💺 You sit in carriages.
🕰️ I run on a schedule.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I have wings.
💺 You need a seatbelt on me.
☁️ I fly above the clouds.

transport.question: I'm like a bicycle, but with a motor. What am I?

hints.text: ⛽ I need fuel to run.
🏍️ You need a helmet to ride me.
💨 I can go faster than a regular bicycle.

transport.question: I can carry lots of goods long distances on roads. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I often carry things to stores.
🚛 I'm bigger than a car.
🛣️ I'm often on the highway.

transport.question: I can fly straight up and down and have blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one place.
🚨 Emergency services sometimes use me.
🏥 I can land on a hospital roof.

transport.question: I travel underground in cities to avoid traffic. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 People use me to commute.
🔦 It's dark where I travel.
🗺️ You can find me on a map with colored lines.

transport.question: I take people to the moon and beyond! What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very fast.
👨‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
🪐 I can go to other planets.

transport.question: I am a vehicle that uses sails and the wind to move across the water. What am I?

hints.text: ⛵ I don't need an engine.
🌊 I am fun to use on a sunny day.
💨 I need wind to operate

cosmos.question: I'm the star you see every day, giving light and warmth along the way. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
🌞 Plants need me to grow.
👀 Look up during the day to see me.

cosmos.question: I’m Earth's best friend, shining bright at night, sometimes round, sometimes just a sliver of light. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 I have phases.
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.
🧀 Some people say I am made of cheese.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas, bigger than the Earth and full of mass. I'm the biggest planet in our solar system. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I have a big red spot.
🪐 I have many moons.
💨 You couldn't stand on me, it's all gas!

cosmos.question: I am a hot, rocky planet, known as the 'Red Planet', what am I?

hints.text: 🚀 Scientists have sent rovers to me.
🍫 I have a lot of iron oxide.
🔥 My two moons are Phobos and Deimos.

cosmos.question: I'm a ringed planet, beautiful and grand, with icy particles all around my band. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock.
🪐 I am a gas giant.
🥶 I'm quite far from the Sun, so I'm cold.

cosmos.question: I’m a group of stars, making pictures in the night, like a bear or a hunter shining bright. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I help sailors find their way.
🐻 The Big Dipper is part of one.
🗺️ I can be seen on maps of the sky.

cosmos.question: I am a huge collection of stars, gas, and dust, all held together by gravity’s thrust. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I come in different shapes, like spirals and ellipticals.
🌌 Our solar system is part of one.
🥛 Ours is called the Milky Way.

cosmos.question: I'm a massive explosion of a star, brighter than anything else by far. What am I?

hints.text: 💥 I can create a nebula.
🌟 I am the death of a giant star.
💡 I am very, very bright, even from far away!

cosmos.question: I'm a place where gravity is so strong, not even light can escape for long. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I am formed from the collapse of a massive star.
🕳️ I suck everything around me in.
🙈 You can't see me directly.

cosmos.question: I am a cloud of gas and dust in space, where new stars are born at a rapid pace. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I often have beautiful colors.
👶 Stars are born inside me.
💨 I am made of hydrogen, helium, and other ionized gases.
